meta.description: Optimize the allocation of products among warehouses to meet demands at minimum transportation cost.

params.name: cost
params.description: Transportation cost per unit between warehouses

vars.name: x
vars.description: Units transported from one warehouse to another

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in WAREHOUSES for j in WAREHOUSES if i != j)

constraints.name: supply_constraint_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '1')

constraints.name: supply_constraint_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['2'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '2')

constraints.name: supply_constraint_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['3'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '3')

constraints.name: supply_constraint_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['4'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '4')

constraints.name: supply_constraint_5
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['5'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '5')

constraints.name: supply_constraint_6
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['6'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '6')

constraints.name: demand_constraint_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['1'] for i in WAREHOUSES if i != '1')

constraints.name: demand_constraint_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['2'] for i in WAREHOUSES if i != '2')

constraints.name: demand_constraint_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['3'] for i in WAREHOUSES if i != '3')

constraints.name: demand_constraint_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['4'] for i in WAREHOUSES if i != '4')

constraints.name: demand_constraint_5
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['5'] for i in WAREHOUSES if i != '5')

constraints.name: demand_constraint_6
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['6'] for i in WAREHOUSES if i != '6')
